backend/main.mo: Backend actor handling user profiles, access control, and per-user level-state saving and retrieval for three event types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two frontend updates related to header image replacement and static asset usage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend components, assets, screens, and game logic modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining light/dark theme variables and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting up PWA metadata, icons, manifest links, and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, display mode, and metadata.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, and network‑first logic with IC call exclusions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating password gate, event selection, gameplay flow, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/decor/RomanticDe: UI component rendering floating heart, flower, and teddy decorations based on a chosen variant.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortraitF: Layout wrapper that applies a portrait frame with optional background pattern and optional PWA install banner.
frontend/src/components/layout/PostUnloc: Romantic header component showing decorative background, glowing logo, hearts, and a subtitle after unlocking content.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallBanne: Floating PWA install banner that guides users to install the app or open a help dialog, with platform‑specific behavior.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallHeart: Heart‑shaped install button that triggers PWA install flow or shows help, with dismissal and iOS handling.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallHelpD: Dialog explaining installation steps for Android, iOS, and desktop using tabbed instructions.
frontend/src/components/quiz/SecretLette: Modal that reveals a secret letter with a themed animation and random image after user activates the reveal step.
Defines the uploaded image list and functions to select images deterministically or randomly per level.
frontend/src/game/assets/winImageMapping: Re‑exports image selection utilities from uploadedImages for game use.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Game constants including password, total levels, and storage key names for progress tracking.
frontend/src/game/content/event3LoveLaug: Array of themed romantic jokes grouped by letters for in‑game content.
frontend/src/game/content/events.ts: Defines the EventContent interface and a list of event objects, plus a helper to fetch an event by id.
frontend/src/game/content/levelHints.ts: Provides a mapping of level numbers to hint strings for puzzle gameplay.
frontend/src/game/content/loseMessages.t: Stores a set of lose messages and exports a function that returns one at random.
frontend/src/game/content/winLetters.ts: Defines WinLetter and provides love and promise letters for each completed level.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/FixedPuzzl: Implements a flexible puzzle level component handling many interaction types like dragging, waiting, tapping, and multi-step logic.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/Level001.t: Implements a level where the heart moves when tapped and the user must tap the instruction text to win.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/Level002.t: Implements a level where dragging the sun downward switches to night mode and triggers a win.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/Level003.t: Implements a press‑and‑hold letter opening mechanic where holding long enough wins and short holds count as failed attempts.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/levelConfi: Defines level configuration types and a map of level numbers to instructions, solutions, and optional data for levels 4–100.
frontend/src/game/levels/levelRegistry.t: Maps level numbers to React components, using custom components for levels 1–3 and a wrapper using FixedPuzzleLevel for 4+.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/content/e: Provides full data definitions for 100 Promises Kept levels, including scenes, promises, actions, emoji hints, and detailed gameplay params.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/content/l: Contains hint strings for Promises Kept levels, keyed by level number.
Stores several randomized lose messages and exports a helper to retrieve one.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/content/w: Defines love and promise letters for each Promises Kept level, keyed by level number.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/levels/im: Fetches event4 level data and adapts it into a PromisesKeptLevelConfig object.
React component implementing Promises Kept level logic with timers, animations, tap behaviors, and parameter‑driven win conditions.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/levels/le: Returns a wrapper React component that loads PromisesKeptPuzzleLevel with the appropriate config for any level.
frontend/src/game/quiz/constants.ts: Defines fixed quiz parameters such as total levels, questions per level, and allowed wrong answers.
frontend/src/game/quiz/content/quizLevel: Defines quiz levels with questions, options, and a secret letter for each level.
frontend/src/game/quiz/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for quiz options, questions, and levels.
frontend/src/game/storage/passwordGate.t: Handles password validation and stores whether the password gate is unlocked in localStorage.
frontend/src/game/storage/progressStorag: Manages main game progress in localStorage, including loading, saving, completing, skipping, and resetting levels.
frontend/src/game/storage/promisesKeptPr: Tracks 'promises kept' progress similar to main progress storage but under a separate key.
frontend/src/game/storage/quizProgressSt: Stores and updates quiz-specific progress with localStorage-backed load, save, complete, skip, and reset functions.
frontend/src/game/storage/useProgress.ts: React hook syncing main progress between localStorage and backend actor, with helpers for completion, skipping, and resetting.
frontend/src/game/storage/usePromisesKep: React hook for 'promises kept' progress, loading from backend when available and providing update helpers.
frontend/src/game/storage/useQuizProgres: React hook managing quiz progress with backend syncing and local fallback behavior.
frontend/src/game/ui/levelBackground.ts: Generates per-level background styling based on level zones with gradients, accent colors, and overlay opacity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile and level state through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode styles, and custom animations/utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker and listens for updates to prompt reloads.
frontend/src/pwa/usePwaInstall.ts: Implements PWA installation logic, handling install prompts, iOS detection, and dismissal state.
frontend/src/screens/EventDetailScreen.t: Displays detailed romantic event content and routes to interactive event screens or a fallback letter view.
frontend/src/screens/EventsHubScreen.tsx: Renders a hub listing all events, showing game or letter types with icons and disabled states, and triggers onEventSelect when an event is clicked.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Displays a password‑gate landing page with romantic visuals, validating input and calling onSuccess when the correct password is entered.
frontend/src/screens/LevelPlayScreen.tsx: Loads and renders a specific game level with hint toggling, skip support, and separate themes for two game types.
frontend/src/screens/LoadingScreen.tsx: Shows a loading animation with a progress bar that completes over time then calls onComplete.
frontend/src/screens/LoseScreen.tsx: Displays a themed lose screen using random messages, shaking animation, and a retry button, with separate styling for two game types.
frontend/src/screens/QuizPlayScreen.tsx: Implements multi‑level quiz gameplay with answer checking, progress tracking, loss handling, completion flow, and optional secret letter reveal.
frontend/src/screens/romantic/DPBEventSc: Implements an event screen where repeated 'No' clicks cycle persuasive messages until 'Yes' triggers a celebration view with photos. Includes a hidden letter toggle and romantic decorations.
frontend/src/screens/romantic/LoveLaughs: Displays 10 selectable joke-filled letters with images in a modal, using a dark romantic theme. Handles letter selection, modal display, and joke image retrieval.
frontend/src/screens/romantic/TogetherFo: Shows a persuasion-style event where the 'No' button moves randomly until 'Yes' triggers a celebration with photos and a letter. Uses romantic visuals and dynamic button positioning.
frontend/src/screens/WinScreen.tsx: Renders a win screen showing level completion, animated visuals, images with fallbacks, and next-level navigation. Includes a special romantic theme for event-4 with hearts, gradients, and a letter display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing. Includes session persistence and hash parameter removal logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including fonts, colors, radii, screens, and plugins. Sets up dark mode, content paths, and custom color variables.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including metadata, known build issues, existing features for header logo updates, and a pending request to replace the post-password events header logo.
